name: Payment Completed -> Create Trello Board & Send Email Automation

mapper.name: Send them a swag box.
mapper.description: Log into swag.com, enter the client information, and ship their swag box (type A).

mapper.name: Record a video introduction.
mapper.description: Salesperson to record a brief, customized 3min Loom introduction to welcome them aboard and improve consolidation/reduce churn.

mapper.subject: Welcome aboard, {{5.firstname}}!
mapper.html:
Hey {{5.firstname}},

Just wanted to extend a warm welcome. {{5.commissionsalesperson}} ran me through {{5.companyname}} and I'm excited to build together.

Below you'll find a link to our project management board. Unlike other companies, we actually show you exactly how far along we are in every project that we do for you. Clients love this level of transparency and (anecdotally) I find it leads to healthier communication & expectations.

Here's the link: {{7.shortUrl}}

Looking forward to kicking this off for you!

Thanks,
Nick
